section.heading: Contents of safe deposit box or other safekeeping repository.
section.text: Except as provided in § 30-103, all personal property, tangible or intangible, held in a safe deposit box or any other safekeeping repository in the District by any person in the ordinary course of business, which is unclaimed by the owner for 3 years or more from the date on which the lease or rental period on the box or other repository expired is presumed abandoned.

annoGroup.heading: Temporary Amendment of Section
annoGroup.annotation: Section 1701(j) of D.C. Law 12-59 substituted “3 years” for “5 years.”
Section 2001(b) of D.C. Law 12-59 provided that the act shall expire after 225 days of its having taken effect.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary amendment of section, see § 1701(j) of the Fiscal Year 1998 Revised Budget Support Emergency Act of 1997 (D.C. Act 12-152, October 17, 1997, 44 DCR 6196), and see § 1701(j) of the Fiscal Year 1998 Revised Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 1997 (D.C. Act 12-239, January 13, 1998, 45 DCR 508).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 16 of the Uniform Unclaimed Property Act (1981 Act).
